articles.author: Shubhajit Roy
articles.title: ‘Do not need certificate from others’: MEA hits out at Hamid Ansari, US lawmakers - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ansari and the four US lawmakers had made comments on the current human rights situation in India at a virtual panel discussion organised by the Indian American Muslim Council Wednesday.
articles.content:
It also targeted Ansari, a former Indian diplomat, and said the track record of the event organisers is as well-known as the biases and political interests of the participants.
